subject: New review (5★) of Simsonn Plus X Racing Simulation Pedal with Haptic Reactor (from Darryn L.)
description_text:
Rating: 5 | Review Text: Fantastic service.... the staff were highly responsive and communicated the same day to any queries I had. 

The pedals are beautiful and have made a huge difference to my driving....I don't know how I drove without load cells.
